creator: hans@gefionsoftware.com
text:
The <jsp:root> element doesn't declare the jsp namespace correctly. Instead of

<jsp:root xmlns="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page"
  version="1.2">

is should be

<jsp:root xmlns:jsp="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page"
  version="1.2">
*** Bug 21740 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: funkman@joedog.org

text:
This has been fixed in CVS. Many thanks for reporting this and providing the 
fix.
creator: markt@apache.org
